text: Abstract .In this paper , we propose a synchronous annotation schema called Synchronous Structured String - Tree Correspondence ( S - SSTC ) .This synchronous variant of SSTC structure is used to describe not only the correspondence between a text in a language and its abstract representation tree but also , the correspondence between different languages .
label: Background

text: Abstract .In this paper , a flexible annotation schema called ( SSTC ) is introduced .In order to describe the correspondence between different languages , we propose a variant of SSTC called synchronous SSTC ( S - SSTC ) .
